title: Software Engineer
jobDetails: Frontend roles: Designing and developing the internal portal application for FRVR, providing an exceptional user experience.
Automated Build and Deployment: Implementing pipelines to streamline the project's build and deployment process.
Microservices and Chatbots: Developing advanced filtering techniques to ensure targeted and personalized message distribution.
API Development and Authentication Services: Building authentication services and RESTful API endpoints using Node.js and Golang to enable in-app purchase verification.
Testing and Documentation: Writing comprehensive test cases and creating detailed documentation to facilitate team collaboration.
Game Development and User Experience: Enhancing the user experience of Krunker.io game and implementing new features to enhance the enjoyment of millions of players.
Cross-Channel Integration and Promotion: Seamlessly integrating H5 games into various channels and successfully launching cross-promotional features to improve game visibility.
Android App Integration and Updates: Integrating SDK into Android applications to achieve regular game updates and continuous improvements.
UI Design and Graphics Optimization: Contributing visually appealing icons, banners, and sprites to enhance the aesthetics of the game.
Workflow Optimization: Utilizing Python to efficiently package project files and modify specific content, simplifying the development process.
Improving User Satisfaction: Actively participating in the game experience team and continuously improving based on user feedback.

title: DevOps Engineer
jobDetails: Contributed to the development of GBase by delivering new features and functionalities to enhance the user experience.
Developed GBase adapters for different kernels, including MIPS, AARC, ARM, and x86, ensuring compatibility with a wide range of hardware architectures.
Wrote comprehensive unit tests to ensure the reliability and stability of GBase and implemented installation and maintenance services to provide continuous support to customers.
Collaborated with the development team to optimize performance and improve scalability of GBase, resulting in faster query processing and increased efficiency.
Conducted thorough code reviews and implemented code refactoring to ensure code quality and adherence to best practices, leading to a more maintainable and robust codebase for GBase.

title: PTE Instructor / IT Support
jobDetails: Provided technical support to users and assisted in resolving various IT-related issues, ensuring that all systems and applications were running smoothly.
Conducted routine maintenance and updates on computer systems and network infrastructure, ensuring optimal performance and security.
Provided lessons that the students can understand and apply on their exams.
Provided guidance and advice on how to improve scores and addressing individual issues.
Used clear and concise lesson plans for quick learning.
Delivered Tips and Strategies.

title: IT Support
jobDetails: Collaborated to migrate and update the company's server rack.
Troubleshot and resolved computer hardware and software issues for staff and students.
Set up and configured workstations and peripherals, such as printers and projectors.
Maintained the inventory of IT equipment and ensured all items were up-to-date and accounted for.
Assisted with network administration tasks, including user account management and network security.
